welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cibolo, a charming city known for its friendly community and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Braunfels Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at New Braunfels Regional Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers, with VIP lounges and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Antonio International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at San Antonio International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stinson Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Stinson Municipal Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Marcos Regional Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at San Marcos Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
